jabber.PubSubListener

type
class
available in
flash, js, neko, php
XEP-0060: Publish-Subscribe
Listens for incoming pubsub events.

Constructor

new(stream : Stream)

Instance Variables

stream(default,null) : Stream

Instance Methods

Configuration got changed

Node got deleted

New pubsub items recieved

Every(!) full pubsub event message

Node got purged
